articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: M4 iPad Pro CPU cores and RAM amount are tied to storage capacity - Ars Technica
articles.description: Apple has tied RAM to storage capacity in iPads, but it's a first for the CPU.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ The new M4 iPad Pro.
65
When Apple announced the Apple M4 chip during its iPad Pro event yesterday, it mentioned that the chip came with "up to" four high-performance CPU cores.
Those sho… [+2537 chars]
